text: Reginald Howard "Reggie" White (December 19, 1961 â€“ December 26, 2004) was an American football player who is now in the Pro Football Hall of Fame. He is well known for being a Evangelical Christian minister. This led to his nickname, "the Minister of Defense." == Other websites == *Packers.com: Reggie White *Reggie White Gravesite Category:1961 births Category:2004 deaths Category:College Football Hall of Fame Category:Pro Football Hall of Fame Category:American Christians Category:American football defensive ends Category:Carolina Panthers players Category:Green Bay Packers players Category:Philadelphia Eagles players Category:Sportspeople from Chattanooga, Tennessee
